name: A Bit of Infinity
description:
A Bit of Infinity:

You are a self-replicating bit of code executing unseen within a host machine. Can you eat up the world's resources to create your own world instead?

A chill,  minute incremental game experience about endless replication.

---

Controls:

  • Keyboard - type to match characters.
    • ESC - Show credits
    • Enter - Dismiss text
    • Keys - Match floating characters
  • Mouse - mouse over, click to purchase upgrades

---

Known bugs:

  • An issue with rendering means some people can't launch the windows .exe - if this happens to you, please try the download labelled "crash on launch workaround"

---

Built in:

6 days for 8 Bits to Infinity - Text Based Jam 2

haha feature creep go brrrrrrr
